name: Brexit
description:
Brexit is a 3D fighting game all about throwing teacups and having a good time Co-Op. Grab a gamepad and get ready to exit! 


Requirements: you must have 2 gamepads and a second player for this game to work properly. Mouse and keyboard is NOT supported.


This game was created by Justice Shultz, David Bread and Amanda Evans for the AIE Exit Game Jam.
